import React from 'react' import "./../css/FoodItem.css"; const FoodItem2 = ({food, shoppingCart}) => { const onAddClick = async(e) => { e.preventDefault() shoppingCart.foods.push(food) shoppingCart.price += food.price } return (

  • {food.name}

    {food.description}

  • {food.price + " RON"}

) } export default FoodItem2
